Giant banks won’t stop cheating until execs fear jail time & regulators show some backbone – & I have a bill for that. My Ending Too Big to Jail Act will hold executives personally accountable for their banks’ fraud & helps regulators enforce the law. Congress should pass it now.

FATF's decision to lift suspension of countermeasures against Iran reinforces need to sanction Iran's financial sector to protect vulnerable banks around the world. I've pushed for legislation mandating such sanctions & will work w my colleagues & the admin to implement them.
